description.value:
Aura 3

Creatures cannot use teleportation powers or effects to enter or exit squares inside the aura.

Basic Attack

At-Will ✦ Fire, Radiant, Weapon

Standard

Reach 2

+35 vs AC; 2d6+10 damage plus 2d6 fire and radiant damage, and the target is slowed and marked until the end of Zachariel's next turn.

At-Will ✦ Fire, Weapon

Immediate Reaction

Trigger: When an adjacent enemy moves or shifts, at-will

Zachariel makes a blazing sword attack against the triggering enemy.

AcidTeleportation

Standard, Recharges When An Enemy Hits Zachariel With A Melee Attack

Ranged sight

Trigger: When an enemy hits zachariel with a melee attack

+31 vs Will; the target disappears into Carceri and is removed from play (save ends). The target is marooned on a bleak island lashed with acid rain, taking 20 acid damage each time it fails a saving throw to end the effect. Aftereffect: The target reappears in a square on the edge of the Zachariel's dimensional ward aura and is immobilized and knocked prone until the end of its next turn.

system.rechargeCondition: When An Enemy Hits Zachariel With A Melee Attack

description.value:
Encounter ✦ Radiant, Zone

Free

Close burst 5

Trigger: When first bloodied, encounter

+31 vs Fortitude; 3d6+9 radiant damage, and the target is blinded (save ends). Effect: The burst creates a zone of brilliant light that lasts until the end of the encounter. Zachariel's blazing sword attacks deal 2d6 extra radiant damage while he is within the zone.

At-Will ✦ Fire, Radiant, Weapon

Standard

Close burst 2

+35 vs AC; 2d6+10 damage plus 2d6 fire and radiant damage, and the target is slowed and marked until the end of Zachariel's next turn.

Recharge 5-6 ✦ Thunder

Minor, Recharge

Close blast 3

+31 vs Fortitude; 4d8+13 thunder damage, and the target is stunned until the end of Zachariel's next turn. Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

At-Will ✦ Fear

Minor 1/Round, At-Will

Close burst 3

Targets creatures marked by Zachariel; +33 vs Will; the target is pushed 3 squares and takes a -2 penalty to all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
Any attack against Zachariel takes a -2 penalty to the attack roll.
Zachariel can make opportunity attacks against all enemies in his reach.

Zachariel is particularly vulnerable to the arrow of fate. If fired from a longbow or shortbow or used as an improvised weapon, when hit Zachariel takes 250 points of damage and is stunned (save ends).

system.biography:
HP 1036; Bloodied 518
Resist 20 fire, 30 radiant Vulnerable see arrow of fate Immune fear 		Init +22 | AP 2 | Save +5
AC 44Fort 42Ref 38Will 40
Speed 8, fly 16 (hover)
Ability ScoresStr 31 (+24)
Con 27 (+22)		Dex 23 (+20)
Int 21 (+19)		Wis 26 (+22)
Cha 24 (+21)
Languages Supernal
Alignment Unaligned
Skills Arcana +24, Diplomacy +26, History +24, Insight +27, Religion +24Senses
Passive Perception 32 | Insight 37

Equipment greatsword , plate armor .
